translations: n.一种大型蘑菇，具有圆形的顶部和短茎，可供食用
· I love cooking with portabella mushrooms.

phrs.translation: 褐菇, 褐色双孢菇, 波特贝拉, 波多黎各菌
波尔塔贝利亚, 导演, 佩雷·波尔塔贝利亚

sentences.sentence: Today, Brandywine produces not only button mushrooms but also portabella, shiitakke and oyster mushrooms.
sentences.translation: 现今白兰地谷不仅生产草菇，还有美洲褐菇，花菇和蚝菇。

sentences.sentence: The results of orthogonal experiment showed that ultrasonic pretreatment time was the main factor that affected the extraction of polysaccharide in portabella.
sentences.translation: 正交试验结果表明：超声波预处理时间是影响褐菇多糖提取量的主要因素；
